QuickOrderInfo: When buying, you only need to set the order quantity, and the order will be filled from the lowest available ask price to the highest available bid price. Use this when you want to execute trades quickly.
BuyExecution: Your order to Buy {{volume, number}} shares of {{stockName}} has been filled at ₩{{price, number}}
SellExecution: Your order to Sell {{volume, number}} shares of {{stockName}} has been filled at ₩{{price, number}}
BuyTradeSuccess: Working order to Buy {{volume, number}} shares of {{stockName}} at ₩{{price, number}}.
SellTradeSuccess: Working order to Sell {{volume, number}} shares of {{stockName}} at ₩{{price, number}}.
CancelTradeSuccess: Cancel order of {{volume}} shares of {{stockName}} completed
EditTradeSuccess: Edit order of {{volume}} shares of {{stockName}} completed

OrderSub.QuickOrderDetail: · The actual order may change depending on market conditions.
OrderSub.CancelQBUY: Do you want to cancel the buy?
OrderSub.CancelQSELL: Do you want to cancel the sell?
OrderSub.NotEnoughBuy: There is not enough deposit available to buy.

PriceSub.prevCompare: Compared to the previous day closing price

TooltipSub.MarketValueToolTip: Sum of Market Value of each item
TooltipSub.TotalToolTip: Sum of Price of each item x Balance - Buy Amount
TooltipSub.TotalPercentToolTip: (Sum of Price of each item x Balance - Avg. Buy Price) ÷ Buy Amount
